abstract: Marjorie Greenspan Kaufman, a managing director and head of investor relations at Kingdon sent out an e-mail to the hedge fund’s clients telling them that the firm was on shaky ground, Dealbreaker reports.
snippet: Marjorie Greenspan Kaufman, a managing director and head of investor relations at Kingdon sent out an e-mail to the hedge fund’s clients telling them that the firm was on shaky ground, Dealbreaker reports.
lead_paragraph: 2:51 p.m. | Updated It seems one hedge fund employee recently let go from Kingdon Capital has not gone quietly.

headline.main: Former I.R. Head Fires Back at Hedge Fund
